My husband died protecting Acarum. The {@LinkCreature:32#3#Sihran berserkers} cut off his hands, and let him bleed to death.

His spirit haunts me, begging me to bring him some justice. I know what he wants, but I can't do it, and everyone in the village thinks I'm mad so they won't help.

It's such a simple requestâ€”just kill the {@LinkCreature:32#3#Sihran berserkers}, cut off their hands, and offer them to Batuk's spirit on Mount Tyrannas.

Here, you may need this sack.
(The path to the grave is well-worn by travelers' feet. You put the sack of hands in a place already stained with blood. What's going on here?)

Batuk died at Daunting Pass.

Kill the {@LinkCreature:32#3#Sihran berserkers} that murdered him and {@LinkCreature:32#1$$fighters} and take their hands.

You believed her too, huh? She hasn't been the same since Batuk died. Haunted.

She keeps sending people out after hands. At least it's Sihran hands...and not anyone else's.

Can we just keep this between us? Thanks.
